lead_paragraph: PBS’s 30-year-old series is trying to respond to the increasingly crowded field of business and financial journalism by playing down stock coverage.
snippet: PBS’s 30-year-old series is trying to respond to the increasingly crowded field of business and financial journalism by playing down stock coverage.

headline.main: Revamped ‘Nightly Business Report’ to Stress Analysis
headline.seo: PBS’s ‘Nightly Business Report’ Will Now Stress Analysis
headline.print_headline: PBS Revamps ‘Nightly Business’ to Stress Analysis
